name: Egee's Sandbox
description:
Welcome to the Sandbox!

In this game you play a small 8-bit Egee sprite and wander around an NES inspired world testing out different game mechanics. The game is currently in Alpha and will reach perpetual beta once the abilities and enemies are implemented.

Note: There's currently no gui; when you launch the executable, you drop right into the game. I will implement a title screen and all that jazz before beta.

Roadmap
  • Release Alpha 🎉
  • Title/Pause Screen
  • Enemies
  • Release Beta 🎉
  • Power-Ups
  • Dialog
  • Better Sprites

Egee's Sandbox is developed with Godot 3.5.2 and GDScript. I'll release the full source code when I am finished with the project but I share bits and pieces in my Discord and on my Patreon.

How-To Play

Launch the game from the executable to begin playing.

Move LEFT and RIGHT with the arrow keys.
JUMP with the up arrow key.
